This website explains the meaning and origin of the slang term "deez nuts." It describes how the phrase is used to interrupt conversations and shows disrespect. The origin dates back to a 1992 song by Dr. Dre. It also mentions how the term gained popularity, especially after an Instagram video went viral. The site discusses its use in real-life conversations, online trolling, and even in a US presidential candidacy prank. It's a fun read to learn about the history and modern usage of this meme.
